Author: s04pscum
Text: A lot of people tend to project their insecurities onto others, and that sounds like what's happening here - I'm sorry that you're the one that has to deal with that. ): It could've been out of genuine concern, though, especially if you dropped the weight really quickly?  Either way, I hate how normalized it is to comment on what other people are eating and their weight and stuff - I get it a lot from my mom, personally. Diet culture is insane and super toxic and you don't deserve to be forced to deal with it. I wish you the best of luck, I hope you find the peace that you want <3

Author: slimdog_millionaire
Text: My dad forced me into treatment against my will because of my restriction. When I "recovered," I developed BED. Not *once* did someone comment on my rapid weight gain or my terrible eating habits, even though I was suffering just as much.
